meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of myeloma.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the patient's bone pain was due to myelomatous changes in the bone marrow.
meanings.sent2: The myelomatous growth in the bone marrow was causing complications for the patient.
meanings.sent3: The myelomatous cells were throwing a party in the bone marrow, causing all the trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a myelomatous shadow, dark and persistent.
meanings.sent5: The myelomatous nature of the disease made it difficult to treat effectively.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or resembling myeloma cells.
meanings.sent1: The biopsy results showed a myelomatous infiltration of the bone marrow.
meanings.sent2: The myelomatous cells were spreading rapidly throughout the body.
meanings.sent3: The myelomatous cells were having a dance-off in the bone marrow.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a myelomatous web, entangled and confusing.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the myelomatous appearance of the cells, confirming the diagnosis.
